author: adrianc
msg: Added a new attribute to the ofbiz-component.xml <webapp> element - access-permission. It is used to specify an explicit permission to allow access to the web application, instead of the implied permissions specified in the base-permission attribute (which causes unpredictable behavior).
Also moved web application authorization code from the Flat Grey visual theme to LoginWorker.java. This change needs to be copied to other visual themes as well.

author: brett
msg: improve reliability of tests on a reloading page
